root.name: Cheese Please
root.description: OverviewCheese Please is a puzzle game developed by Noobware and published by Gamevil Inc. for the iPhone and iPad platforms.GameplayIn Cheese Please the player plays as Lola the mouse. Lola must be guided through a series of mazes to try and get the cheese. There are multiple traps that must be avoided in order to reach the end of the maze.
